channel.title: Will you help me with this client errror?
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
tHAT HAPPENS when i try to start my friends servers client and this client base i downloaded will you help me fix it please?

item.title: Will you help me with this client errror?
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

could not find the main class: client, program will exit
opens up a little java box and thats what i get how to fix that?

Read full topic
item.source: Will you help me with this client errror?

item.title: Will you help me with this client errror?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It can’t find the client class. Edit the batch to redirect it to the specific directory.

Read full topic
